akas: Bu Bu Jing Xin China (Mandarin title) (complete title)
Startling by Each Step World-wide (English title)
akas from release info: Bu Bu Jing Xin China (Mandarin title) (complete title)
Startling by Each Step World-wide (English title)

1.title: Yinian Zhizhuo
1.plot: After an accident in 2011, Zhang Xiao is transported to the Qing dynasty and into another body, where she tries to find a way to return to the present.

2.title: Episode #1.2
2.plot: Zhang Xiao questions why Ruo Lan isn't on better terms with the Eighth Prince. Tenth Prince's birthday party is a chance for the sisters to prove themselves.

3.title: Episode #1.3
3.plot: Zhang Xiao fights with Ming Yu at the party, giving her a reputation and alienating Ruo Lan. The emperor holds a Mid-Autumn celebration.

4.title: Episode #1.4
4.plot: Tenth Prince is unhappy about his impending marriage. Zhang Xiao questions her feelings for Eighth Prince.

5.title: Episode #1.5
5.plot: Ruo Lan's performance in the equestrian contest brings up old feelings for her and Eighth Prince. Thirteenth Prince resolves to help Zhang Xiao in the harem selection.

6.title: Episode #1.6
6.plot: Zhang Xiao goes to the palace even as Eighth Prince tries to get her removed from the selection process with surprising results.

7.title: Episode #1.7
7.plot: When the emperor leads a hunting trip, Eighth Prince is left in charge with the crown prince hoping he'll fail. Zhang Xiao asks for horseback riding lessons.

8.title: Episode #1.8
8.plot: Zhang Xiao's knowledge of the future causes trouble for her. First Prince manipulates the crown prince into angering the emperor.

9.title: Episode #1.9
9.plot: Zhang Xiao worries Eighth Prince is in danger as everyone waits to see who will be appointed crown prince.

10.title: Episode #1.10
10.plot: The emperor changes his sons' ranks, but retains his suspicions. Ruo Lan visits on Zhang Xiao's birthday and encourages her to think about marrying.

11.title: Episode #1.11
11.plot: While the emperor is away, Fourth Prince makes political moves for revenge. Fourteenth Prince sneaks into the hunting camp.

12.title: Episode #1.12
12.plot: Zhang Xiao accepts that she has become involved in the events of the past, but may be able to change them. Fourteenth Prince's visit does not go unnoticed.

13.title: Episode #1.13
13.plot: Zhang Xiao asks Eighth Prince to stop fighting for the throne, which strains their relationship.

14.title: Episode #1.14
14.plot: Ming Hui promises to help Eighth Prince and makes a request of Ruo Lan. Zhang Xiao insists on an answer to her ultimatum.

15.title: Episode #1.15
15.plot: Min Min causes trouble when she finds out the truth. Zhang Xiao is unimpressed with Fourteenth Prince's offer of friendship.

16.title: Episode #1.16
16.plot: A large-scale embezzlement case causes tension in the palace as secrets are revealed.

17.title: Episode #1.17
17.plot: Zhang Xiao receives a marriage offer and becomes sick while her friends try to find a way to prevent the emperor from approving it.

18.title: Episode #1.18
18.plot: The investigation of Crown Prince is concluded. Zhang Xiao tries to help Tenth Prince with his marriage.

19.title: Episode #1.19
19.plot: Tenth Prince threatens Ming Yu with divorce. Zhang Xiao is finally able to talk to Eighth Prince.

20.title: Episode #1.20
20.plot: Fourth Prince is accused of secretly plotting and Thirteenth Prince becomes a scapegoat. Zhang Xiao angers the emperor by speaking for Lu Wu.

21.title: Episode #1.21
21.plot: Zhang Xiao's marriage plans are no longer an option. Crown Prince is demoted again.

22.title: Episode #1.22
22.plot: Consort De asks her sons not to become involved in the struggle for the crown prince position. The emperor takes drastic action against Eighth Prince.

23.title: Episode #1.23
23.plot: Zhang Xiao is fired when she refuses to marry as ordered. Fourteenth Prince is appointed as an army general.

24.title: Episode #1.24
24.plot: Fourteenth Prince leaves to command the army. The emperor begins to trust Fourth Prince again.

25.title: Episode #1.25
25.plot: The emperor names his heir before passing away, but the princes question Fourth Prince's claim of inheritance.

26.title: Episode #1.26
26.plot: Thirteenth Prince's decade-long imprisonment finally ends. Fourth Prince begins to silence those who know the truth.

27.title: Episode #1.27
27.plot: Zhang Xiao wants Thirteenth Prince to stop the search for Lu Wu. Consort De refuses to become empress dowager.

28.title: Episode #1.28
28.plot: Zhang Xiao makes a request of Eighth Prince on behalf of Ruo Lan. Fourth Prince sends his brothers away to prevent them from plotting together.

29.title: Episode #1.29
29.plot: When Eighth Prince gets into trouble, Zhang Xiao can't risk sticking up for him.

30.title: Episode #1.30
30.plot: Zhang Xiao finds out what happened to Eunuch Li and begins to fear Fourth Prince. Ninth Prince's plotting results in the gruesome death of an unexpected spy.

31.title: Episode #1.31
31.plot: Cheng Huan's new servant relays a cryptic message. Zhang Xiao finds out wanting to keep Eighth Prince safe had unforeseen consequences.

32.title: Episode #1.32
32.plot: Eighth Prince is forced to divorce Ming Hui. Ming Yu begs Zhang Xiao to ask for leniency for Tenth Prince.

33.title: Episode #1.33
33.plot: Fourteenth Prince finds an unexpected way to get Zhang Xiao away from the palace. Eighth Prince tells Fourth Prince his history with Zhang Xiao.

34.title: Episode #1.34
34.plot: As her health grows worse, Zhang Xiao sends for Fourth Prince, who suspects that she and Fourteenth Prince are in love.

35.title: Episode #1.35
35.plot: Fourth Prince, Fourteenth Prince, and Eighth Prince confront each other over Zhang Xiao's death. Qiao Hui fulfills her promises and allows Zhang Xiao to take revenge on Ninth Prince.

36.title: Episode #1.36

1.title: Episode #2.1
1.plot: Zhang Xiao is a southerner, who moved to Beijing working as an OL, with dreams of romance and a stable job.

2.title: Episode #2.2
2.plot: By coincidence, Zhang gets a job at a conglomerate 'Zhen Tian'.

3.title: Episode #2.3
3.plot: Like all newbie, Zhang is bullied and stepped on, the saving grace is her boss Yin Zheng.

4.title: Episode #2.4
4.plot: Zhang and Yin Zheng develops mutual feelings for each other.

5.title: Episode #2.5
5.plot: Yin Zheng, Kang Xi Hang both are fore-runners in next in line inheriting the firm.

6.title: Episode #2.6
6.plot: Kang Xi Hang steps into Zhang's world.

7.title: Episode #2.7
7.plot: Zhang is twirled into the eye of the corporate battles.

8.title: Episode #2.8
8.plot: Many twists and turns happen to Zhang.

9.title: Episode #2.9
9.plot: Zhang applied for a graphic designer to work in Zhentian.

11.title: Episode #2.11
11.plot: Zhao Wei was shocked to see the appearance of Zhang Xiao and Lan Lan,

12.title: Episode #2.12
12.plot: Yin Zheng and Kang Siyu once again argued.

13.title: Episode #2.13
13.plot: After the birthday, Zhang Xiao is smothered.

14.title: Episode #2.14
14.plot: So must make a sacrifice for the sake of the king and his daughter. The princes are stunned to reunite with a familiar face.

15.title: Episode #2.15
15.plot: Just when Zhang Xiao's love for Kang Meng, Kang's girlfriend Meng Xinyi came back from abroad.

16.title: Episode #2.16
16.plot: Meng discovers the betrayal of her boyfriend, which led to her death in an accident.

17.title: Episode #2.17
17.plot: Kang and Zhang are seriously hurt.

18.title: Episode #2.18
18.plot: Yin Zheng appeared in Zhang's side in time to help her.

19.title: Episode #2.19
19.plot: Zhang Xiaofang accidentally recovered her memory.

20.title: Episode #2.20
20.plot: Misunderstanding between the lovers is over.

21.title: Episode #2.21
21.plot: An exclusive shout out from the cast of Scarlet Heart: Ryeo!

22.title: Episode #2.22

imdb.plot outline: Zhang Xiao is a modern girl who was hit by a car and accidentaly enter the Qing dynasty. There, she lives as Maertai Ruoxi, a Manchu ethnic girl. As she struggles to go back to the future, she involved with the inner palace problem, and accidentally involved in a love story with many Emperor Kangxi's son including the future emperor, Emperor Yongzheng.
imdb.title: Startling by Each Step
plot: After a car accident plunges a woman into the dreamy Chinese past that gave the whole life in the Beijing imperial palace after that she returns to her life in the modern world.

Zhang Xiao is a modern girl who was hit by a car and accidentaly enter the Qing dynasty. There, she lives as Maertai Ruoxi, a Manchu ethnic girl. As she struggles to go back to the future, she involved with the inner palace problem, and accidentally involved in a love story with many Emperor Kangxi's son including the future emperor, Emperor Yongzheng.::Filbert Dick Cavanugh Huang
